short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a highlight on today's date in Google Calendar Month View.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calendar Highlight Today is a simple and efficient Chrome extension designed to enhance your experience on Google Calendar. This extension highlights today's date specifically in the month view, making it easy to identify your schedule at a glance. Whether you're managing personal appointments or work tasks, this tool ensures that you never miss todayâ€™s date while in month view.
